description:
In order for Kawaki to become a genin, it’s decided that he can take a special test that differs from the one held at the Ninja Academy. A D-rank mission is deemed to be equivalent, so Kawaki is assigned as an additional member. However, he is difficult to work with, ignores the need for teamwork, and acts on his own—giving his teammates a hard time while disrupting the mission!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kawaki sur la voie des ninjas
Kawaki`s Path to Becoming a Ninja
